verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, Where is the <S%H5612>bill<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H3748>divorce<s%>, whom I have put <S%H7971>away<s%>? or which of my <S%H5383>creditors<s%> is it to whom I have <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H5771>you<s%>? Behold, for your iniquities have you <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H6588>yourselves<s%>, and for your transgressions is your <S%H517>mother<s%> put <S%H7971>away<s%>.

<S%H935>Therefore<s%>, when I came, was there no <S%H376>man<s%>? when I <S%H7121>called<s%>, was there none to <S%H6030>answer<s%>? Is my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H7114>shortened<s%> at <S%H7114>all<s%>, that it cannot <S%H6304>redeem<s%>? or have I no <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%>? <S%H1606>behold<s%>, at my rebuke I dry <S%H2717>up<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, I <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: their <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H887>stinks<s%>, because there is no <S%H4325>water<s%>, and <S%H4191>dies<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst<s%>.
I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> with <S%H6940>blackness<s%>, and I <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> their <S%H3682>covering<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H3928>learned<s%>, that I should <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H5790>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in season to him that is <S%H3287>weary<s%>: he <S%H5782>wakens<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning<s%>, he <S%H5782>wakes<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> as the <S%H3928>learned<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> has <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%>, and I was not <S%H4784>rebellious<s%>, neither turned <S%H5472>away<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>.

I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H1460>back<s%> to the <S%H5221>smiters<s%>, and my <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> to them that plucked <S%H4803>off<s%> the <S%H5641>hair<s%>: I hid not my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H3639>shame<s%> and <S%H7536>spitting<s%>.

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3637>me<s%>; therefore shall I not be confounded: therefore have I <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> like a <S%H2496>flint<s%>, and I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.

He is <S%H7138>near<s%> that <S%H6663>justifies<s%> <S%H7378>me<s%>; who will contend with <S%H5975>me<s%>? let us stand <S%H3162>together<s%>: who is my <S%H1167>adversary<s%>? let him come near to <S%H5066>me<s%>.

<S%H136>Behold<s%>, the Lord <S%H3069>God<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H7561>me<s%>; who is he that shall condemn <S%H1086>me<s%>? behold, they all shall wax old as a <S%H899>garment<s%>; the <S%H6211>moth<s%> shall eat them <S%H398>up<s%>.

Who is among you that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that <S%H8085>obeys<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that <S%H1980>walks<s%> in <S%H2825>darkness<s%>, and has no <S%H5051>light<s%>? let him <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H8172>stay<s%> upon his <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H6919>Behold<s%>, all you that kindle a <S%H784>fire<s%>, that surround yourselves <S%H247>about<s%> with <S%H2131>sparks<s%>: <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H217>light<s%> of your <S%H784>fire<s%>, and in the <S%H2131>sparks<s%> that you have <S%H1197>kindled<s%>. This shall you have of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; you shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H4620>sorrow<s%>.
